div.h2: SNOMED CT Reason Medication Not Given Codes
div.p: This value set includes all medication refused, medication not administered, and non administration of necessary drug or medicine codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/reason-medication-not-given defines the following codes:

tr.td: The patient was not available when the dose was scheduled.
The patient was asleep when the dose was scheduled.
The patient was given the medication and immediately vomited it back.
